title: ◦ Imported relevant issues from the (abandoned) vk_wsi_persistent_swapchain_images extension

note: James Jones) ◦ Added inline proposed resolutions (marked with [JRJ]) to some XXX questions/issues. These should be moved to the issues section in a subsequent update if the proposals are adopted.
title: ◦ Added issue 9, and the related VK_SUBOPTIMAL_KHR result code. ◦ Renamed VK_OUT_OF_DATE_KHR to VK_ERROR_OUT_OF_DATE_KHR

note: ◦ Added issue 11 with a proposed resolution, and the related issue 12.

title: ◦ Updated various sections of the spec to match the proposed resolution to issue 11
◦ Moved some structures to VK_EXT_KHR_swap_chain to resolve the spec’s issues 1 and 2
◦ Added issues 14 - 16 and related spec language. ◦ Fixed some spelling errors. ◦ Added language describing the meaningful return values for vkAcquireNextImageKHR and vkQueuePresentKHR
◦ Changed special value from "-1" to "0" so that the data types can be unsigned
◦ Clarified the values of VkSurfacePropertiesKHR::minImageCount and the timeout parameter of the vkAcquireNextImageKHR function
◦ Updated enum-extending values using new convention
◦ Added language describing how to use VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SOURCE_KHR
◦ Added issues 19 and 20 as well as proposed resolutions
◦ Changed special value for VkSurfacePropertiesKHR::currentExtent back to "-1" from "0". This value will never need to be unsigned, and "0" is actually a legal value
◦ Examples now show use of function pointers for extension functions. ◦ Eliminated extraneous whitespace
